com.defano.jmonet.algo.dither

Interface Ditherer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDitherer, AtkinsonDitherer, BurkesDitherer, FloydSteinbergDitherer, JarvisJudiceNinkeDitherer, NullDitherer, SierraDitherer, SierraLiteDitherer, SierraTwoDitherer, StuckiDitherer

    public interface Ditherer
    An object that applies a QuantizationFunction to a BufferedImage and dithers (diffuses) the resulting quantization error.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BufferedImage dither(BufferedImage source, QuantizationFunction quantizer)
      Applies a QuantizationFunction to each pixel in the source image and dithers (diffuses) the quantization error.

    • Method Detail

      • dither

        BufferedImage dither(BufferedImage source,
                     QuantizationFunction quantizer)
        Applies a QuantizationFunction to each pixel in the source image and dithers (diffuses) the quantization error.
        Parameters:
        source - The source image to be quantized and dithered; unmodified by this operation.
        quantizer - The quantization function to use.
        Returns:
        A copy of the source image with the quantization/dithering function applied.
